alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Parke; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Parke, southwestern Montgomery and northwestern Putnam Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Rockville, or 19 miles southwest of Crawfordsville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Parke, southwestern Montgomery and northwestern Putnam Counties, including the following locations... Cecil Harden Lake, Marshall, Russellville, Waveland, Turkey Run State Park and Judson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
